name: Hydro Flask Insulated Food Jar 591ml
description: Keeps your food the right temperature from the first bite, to the last. This insulated jar is easy to clean, durable, and won’t transfer any taste to your food.Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel.TempShield™ double wall insulation keeps food the temps you want, and won’t sweat on you.Leak-proof screw-top lid.Tough powder coated finish is grippy and super scratch-resistant.
